originalText.text: Bisou started training with Michelle at about 4 months old via Amanda Gagnon Puppy Kindergarten program and it was amazing! She met her first new puppy friends there and I received the support and education I needed to help Bisou grow into a well adjusted and confident puppy. We loved the trainings and Michelle's approach so much, upon graduation we enrolled in adolescents day school for continued support + socialization for Bisou. Let me tell you Bisou is one happy pup thanks to Michelle and the Amanda Gagnon Dog Training School and looks forward to going to day school every week!

originalText.text: We've been bringing our dog, Rocky Potato, to Amanda Gagnon for about 8 months now. He absolutely LOVES going! The trainers are all so warm and friendly. We love that they use only positive reinforcement training. Rocky can't get enough of all the classes, from agility to leash skills. All the trainers have gotten to know Rocky and help work with us on training that works best for us. We also love getting his report card w/ photo from adolescent school and hang it on our fridge weekly

originalText.text:
I can’t tell you how thankful I am that my Vet told me about AGDT. I have a pitbull puppy who is so lovely BUT had a bunch of issues to work through. I thought that I would never be able to get him to behave or listen to me. He was pulling heavily on the leash, lunged at other dogs (not aggressive but just excited), and kept jumping on my senior dog. There’s a lot more but let’s just say those were the top three. I started with the puppy school and his road to being the best dog started there.

The trainers at AGDT are just the best of the best. They are very caring and careful with how they handle each dog. Every dog gets special attention and treatment. And you can feel how much they care for your dog and stay involved in the whole process.

Flash forward…after months of attending the puppy school and adolescent socials my dog is almost the perfect dog!! He is still not a year yet but the improvement was tenfold! Thank you AGDT you have given me and my family a wonderful and well behaved pit bull to enjoy for life!! I have referred anyone that approaches me on dog training and socialization. Hands down highly recommended!!!!

originalText.text:
Shocked with the reviews. I’m pretty sure my dog is has anxiety from just the one class I took him to.
1. There should be older dogs to help socialize younger dogs/More preparation for the puppy classes.
2. There were only 2 other pups in the class that were playing aggressively. Do not plan on coming back here. Instructor was nice but definitely not worth the money.

originalText.text: My dog Baci has been going to Amanda Doggy school since she came home from her litter. I still remember her first puppy social I was so worried because she was unvaccinated but they took all the correct measures in ensuring the safety of the puppies. Every since then we have taken multiple classes; group classes and privates with Sam, weekly Adolescent Day school with Gwen and endless adventures at Playgroup. We would have been so lost without the team at AGD, they have help me train and reinforce good dog behavior. Everyone always complements how well behave my dog can be and is really because of the AGD team. I will continue to recommend AGD to anyone who needs help training a dog.
